serverSync.title: Server Integration
serverSync.description: Connect and sync with your voice server agent. Server data will override local settings.
serverSync.agentIdHelper: Enter the Agent ID from your server account (format: agent_xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx)
serverSync.agentIdDescription: Enter your voice server agent ID to connect and sync data.
serverSync.enterAgentId: Please enter a Server Agent ID
serverSync.validateFirst: Please validate the Agent ID first
serverSync.invalidId: Invalid Agent ID or not accessible

syncInfo.title: What happens when you sync?
syncInfo.agentName: Agent name will be updated from server
syncInfo.voiceId: Voice ID will be synced from server TTS settings
syncInfo.systemPrompt: System prompt will be updated from server agent prompt
syncInfo.firstMessage: First message will be synced from server
syncInfo.model: AI model will be mapped to the closest equivalent
syncInfo.maxTokens: Max tokens setting will be synced
syncInfo.voiceSettings: Voice stability, similarity, and style settings will be synced
syncInfo.priority: Server data takes priority over local settings
